job.title: Software Engineer (Payments)
job.description: puSoftware Engineer PaymentsuppREQ 121696nbspEngineeringppPalo Alto CA United StatesppbrppbrppstronguAbout Yo LabsustrongppTechnology has changed daily life in a way no one could have imaginednbspIts made us more productive capable and connectednbspBut it has come at a costnbspWere productive but overwhelmednbspCapable but paralyzed by too many choicesnbspConnected but only if social media countsnbspLiving this way creates a void in our daily livesnbspYo Labs is here to change thatnbspOur team is committed to alleviating the mental load that our modern world has created by putting human connection back into technology and caretaking at the heart of everything we createppbrppbrppstronguWhat youll get to doustrongppThe goal of the Payments Team is to provide buyers and sellers everywhere with a frictionless payments experience on our platformpulliHave a critical role in building and maintaining our payments platform processing high transaction volumesliliManage all technical aspects of relationships with payment providers and integrate new payment methods into our payment platformliliImplement and deliver new payment features leading to higher checkout conversionliliBuild reporting and monitoring tools to ensure the stability and security of the payments systemliulpbrppstronguWhat Youll BringustrongpulliBachelors degree in Computer Science or related field or equivalent work experiencelili4 years of industry experience building data driven systems but we do realize quality of experience is more important than actual yearsliliExperience developing APIs and integrating thirdparty servicesliliProven track record of working successfully with crossfunctional teamsliliStrong sense of web design and attuned to the fundamentals of user experienceliliExperience with one or more of the following large systems software design development of distributed or parallel systems database design machine learning application developmentliliExcellent communication and collaboration skillsliliExcellent problem solving and analytical thinking skillsliulpbrppstronguBonusustrongpulliExperience integrating with payment service
